author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content: BLOGS A PART: most probably ' [Berline Caligraphique](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060147/http:/les-graphiquants.fr/#!/berline)' by [Les Graphiquants](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060147/http:/www.les-graphiquants.fr/) Maxime Tétard and Romain Rachlin, calligraphic variation of 'Berline Grotesk'
